Day 16 - Manga 358*
When I saw the cover, I could feel my heart breaking into small pieces, already knowing what awaited me. Nevertheless, it was even worse than I thought. The bodies are absolutely horrible and tge masculine faces look like they were copied and pasted from a monkey's.
1/10.
Didn't really like the artstyle but nothing that's really bad so 4/10
